extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade or Patch for CVE-2025-24481
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to V15.0 or apply the patch for CVE-2025-24481. Refer to Answer ID 1152306 for details.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Physical Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure physical access to the workstation is protected to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Port 8091
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to Port 8091 at the network or workstation level to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to V15.0 or apply the patch for CVE-2025-24482. Refer to Answer ID 1152304 for details.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Environment Variables
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the FactoryTalkÂ® View SE installation path (C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Rockwell) is set before all others in the PATH environment variable.
